title: Launch usage-based pricing with Stripe Billing
summary:
Learn how to launch new usage-based pricing models with Stripe Billing. This video will walk you through usage-based billing strategies and pricing models, setting up metered pricing and recording product usage, automating the billing process, and monitoring performance. Get started with Stripe today and launch usage-based pricing for your subscription products. 

Chapters:
00:00 Introducing usage-based billing
00:37 Understanding usage-based billing
01:05 Pricing models
01:42 Setting up usage-based billing
02:25 Recording usage
03:14 Monitoring and analytics

Resources: 
https://docs.stripe.com/billing/subscriptions/usage-based 

Get started with Stripe: https://stripe.com/register
